types.html:
par acquit de conscience

  1. out of an abundance of caution, just in case, just to be on the safe side, for (some)one's peace of mind, just to set (some)one's mind at rest, out of principle
    Synonyms: par principe, au cas où
trans: out of an abundance of caution, just in case, just to be on the safe side, for one's peace of mind, just to set one's mind at rest, out of principle

title: par acquit de conscience
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pa.ʁ‿a.ki d(ə) kɔ̃.sjɑ̃s/
